translation.en: Let's make that money.
What have you guys been eating?
Score!
Gah… this isn't what it looks like. I'm only here for your poop.
translation.it: Non è come sembra. Cercavo la cacca.

translation.en: [chuckles] I mean, I'm here for the mushrooms in your poop.
Yeah, that doesn't sound any better.
Catch!
Sorry I can't stay for dinner.
Come on, who throws somebody at somebody?
translation.it: Ma chi lancia qualcuno a qualcuno?

translation.en: Whoa!
Large rats.
Dirty hands, filthy rich.
translation.it: Sporcarsi le mani ti fa diventare ricco.

translation.en: Hurry up, man.
I can't do business until you deliver the goods.
translation.it: Non posso lavorare senza la merce.

translation.en: Tyson, you're in for a treat, you lucky wizard.
Freshly tracked.
Ah, it better be. My dupe spell is useless without multiplying mushrooms.
translation.it: Sarà meglio. Niente sortilegio replicante senza i funghi moltiplicatori.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that's the good stuff right there.
Hurry up, man. You don't wanna get busted for doing magic in public.
translation.it: Sbrigati, o ti beccheranno a fare magie in pubblico.

translation.en: One more second.
All right! Double your pleasure.
You, get to Tribeca.
You, Soho. And get my money back before you disappear this time!
translation.it: Tu, a Soho. E riportatemi gli incassi prima di sparire.

translation.en: Oh, look at this little guy.
How's about a mini-dog, Spellbound? On the house.
translation.it: Un mini hot dog? Offre la casa.

translation.en: Uh… I don't eat magic.
You may be half-sized, but you charge full price. You hear me?
translation.it: Sarai anche piccolo, ma chiedi il prezzo intero, ok?

translation.en: Getting partners was the best business decision I ever made.
translation.it: Farmi dei soci è stata la miglior decisione della mia vita.

translation.en: You got someone watching your back, kid? Ha! You volunteering?
translation.it: - Hai chi ti guarda le spalle? - Ti offri tu?

translation.en: Nah, I'm not trying to buddy up with somebody on the wrong side of The Pie Maker.
translation.it: Non mi alleo con chi è nemico della Magica Pasticcera.

translation.en: Who cares about that old witch?
Her bakers are searching for you, kid.
She wants you that bad, you must've really screwed up tracking something for her.
translation.it: La sua insistenza mi fa pensare che tu abbia fallito una sua missione.

translation.en: It's fine. I'm close to finding a Fugu Rose.
translation.it: Tranquillo. Sto per trovare una Rosa Fugu.

translation.en: Whoa. That rose is worth serious money, kid. You found one?
translation.it: Wow! Quella rosa vale un sacco di soldi. Ne hai trovata una?

translation.en: I just need help to track the last step. Once I get that, ha! All my debts are cleared and I'm set.
translation.it: Mi serve solo una mano per concludere. Dopodiché i miei debiti saranno saldati.

translation.en: Yeah, except you'll still be stinky,
friendless, and, oh yeah, not magic.
Hygiene's a scam, friends are a scam, and, oh yeah, magic is a scam.
translation.it: L'igiene fa schifo, gli amici pure e… anche la magia fa schifo.

translation.en: Call it what you want, kid, but my magic buddies are making me rich.
translation.it: Come ti pare, ma i miei amici magici mi rendono ricco.

translation.en: Hey-hey, guys.
I was just on my way to see you--
Hey, where were you?
You see that little hot dog guy down the block? You have to try one of his dogs.
translation.it: Hai visto il piccoletto che vende hot dog? Dovresti proprio assaggiarne uno.

translation.en: -[grunts] -[baker] We searched. No magic on him.
Daniel, my boy.
I always forget how cute your place is, Pie Maker.
translation.it: Non ricordavo quanto fosse carino, Magica Pasticcera.

translation.en: The pies, the… curtains, the cyclops henchmen.
translation.it: I dolci, le tendine, i ciclopi tirapiedi…

translation.en: I didn't become the most wicked witch of New York
translation.it: Non sono diventata la strega più malvagia qui

translation.en: by having low-life spell Trackers fail me.
My clients expect the best magical ingredients.
translation.it: I miei clienti si aspettano gli ingredienti migliori,

translation.en: Ingredients you were supposed to deliver.
translation.it: I miei clienti si aspettano gli ingredienti migliori, che stava a te trovare.

translation.en: Where are my gnome whiskers?
translation.it: Dove sono i miei baffi di gnomo?

translation.en: I was gonna get them to you, I swear! But the Bureau sicced a dowser on me, I had to ditch 'em.
translation.it: Volevo portarteli, ma ho dovuto buttarli per via del Dipartimento.

translation.en: I have a plan.
The magic world knows my pies have the most dangerous ingredients.
translation.it: Il mondo magico sa che io uso gli ingredienti più pericolosi,

translation.en: Ingredients you promised to find me and failed.
translation.it: e tu non sei riuscito a procurarmeli.

translation.en: That's fair, but I'm tracking something big for you.
translation.it: Ma ho in serbo qualcosa di grosso per te.

translation.en: Yes, for me, because you owe me.
translation.it: Sì, per me, perché sei in debito con me.

translation.en: You're my Tracker now.
You will do nothing
translation.it: Non farai altro che trovare gli ingredienti illegali

translation.en: but find every little illegal ingredient I need for my magic pies.
translation.it: Non farai altro che trovare gli ingredienti illegali che servono per le mie torte magiche.

translation.en: I told you, the Bureau heat on me has been intense,
translation.it: Il Dipartimento ce l'ha con me,

translation.en: but when I can track again, I'll make it up to you. It's all about you.
translation.it: ma presto mi farò perdonare. Sarò al tuo servizio.

translation.en: Uh-uh-uh. You're not telling me the truth.
translation.it: Non mi stai dicendo la verità.

translation.en: I haven't done any tracking at all, I swear.
translation.it: Non ho cercato niente per nessuno.

translation.en: Bring out…
…The Beast.
Ah… a pig?
Hey! Come on.
[giggling] Get this thing off of me. It tickles, but in a scary way.
translation.it: Portatelo via! Fa il solletico, ma in modo inquietante.

translation.en: [Pie Maker] Don't struggle.
The pig sniffer is powerful enough to sense any magic from a hundred yards away.
translation.it: Il maiale può fiutare la magia fino a 100 metri di distanza.

translation.en: Hey, what the--
Ogre mushrooms.
Fresh.
Impressive work.
Get his eye-patch ready.
This isn't necessary!
Now, which are you, Daniel?
A heart? Oh, no, no, no.
You clearly think you're a star.
translation.it: È chiaro che pensi di essere una stella.

translation.en: I could get you a Fugu Rose!
Impossible.
No one's seen a Fugu Rose in years.
translation.it: Non se ne vedono più da anni.

translation.en: They're priceless. I know where one is.
My best Trackers couldn't do that. No way you could, silly boy.
translation.it: I miei Cercatori non ci sono riusciti. Dubito che ce la farai tu.

translation.en: Give me 24 hours and it's yours, if you erase all my debt.
translation.it: Dammi 24 ore e sarà tua, se cancellerai i miei debiti.

translation.en: Well, dear, we have a deal.
[Pie Maker] You better not disappoint me again,
because you won't like what this spell will do to you. Not one bit.
translation.it: o non ti piacerà cosa ti farà questo incantesimo. Neanche un po'.

translation.en: Great. Heh. You'll be seeing me soon.
There is still the little matter of you lying to me, though.
translation.it: Resta ancora il fatto che tu mi hai mentito.

translation.en: -Wait! We have a deal. -[Pie Maker chuckles evilly]
My dear,
you can still find the Rose with one eye.
translation.it: puoi trovare la Rosa anche con un occhio solo.

translation.en: No! That activates the oven to full power.
translation.it: No! Manderà il forno a piena potenza.

translation.en: Turn off the oven, you buffoon!
Ha! What are you doing?
[Daniel] You're just the kind of help I've been looking for.
See you lovebirds in 24 hours.
[Pie Maker] I'll take both your eyes for that!
Gotta catch my breath.
-You said it. -[screams]
Did you just talk?
Hey, thanks for saving my bacon, man. She is awful.
translation.it: Grazie di avermi salvato. È orrenda.

translation.en: She has a place full of food, never gives me a crumb.
translation.it: Ha tanto cibo, ma non mi dà niente.

translation.en: So, you smell magic and talk.
translation.it: Sai fiutare la magia e sai parlare.

translation.en: Any other tricks I should know about? You turn into a car or something?
translation.it: C'è altro? Ti trasformi in un'auto?

translation.en: Oh, you done it now. How did you know I turn into a car?
translation.it: Oh, cavolo! Come fai a saperlo?

translation.en: I'm just playing. I can't turn into a car. That'd be stupid.
translation.it: Scherzo. Non mi trasformo in un'auto. Sarebbe stupido.

translation.en: You're stupid. Aw, it's a little bit endearing, though.
translation.it: Tu sei stupido. Ma mi fai tenerezza.

translation.en: Well, thanks again, I owe you. All right. I'm out. Peace.
translation.it: Grazie ancora. Ti devo un favore. Ora vado. Pace.

translation.en: Throwing up a, "Peace, I'm out" sign, you just can't tell 'cause I have a hoof.
translation.it: Non hai notato il segno della pace per via dell'unghione.

translation.en: Uh-huh. You do owe me. And I have a way you can repay me right now.
translation.it: Mi devi un favore. E so già come puoi sdebitarti.

translation.en: I-I-I-I-I'm not going anywhere with any magician ever again.
translation.it: Non andrò da nessuna parte con un altro mago.

translation.en: Oh, well, you're in luck. I'm not a magician, I'm a Tracker.
translation.it: Beh, sei fortunato. Non sono un mago. Sono un Cercatore.

translation.en: -I just sell magical ingredients. -Uh-huh. Cool story, bruh.
Wait, I know where a Fugu Rose is-- Ish.
translation.it: So dove trovare una Rosa Fugu… quasi.

translation.en: I don't know exactly where, so I need your magic smelling skills to get me to the finish.
translation.it: Non di preciso, perciò mi serve il tuo fiuto magico.

translation.en: Pie Maker wanted to take your eye before you wrecked her shop,
translation.it: La strega voleva il tuo occhio prima che le distruggessi il negozio. E ora? La milza?

translation.en: what'd you think she's gonna want now? A spleen?
translation.it: prima che le distruggessi il negozio. E ora? La milza?

translation.en: Oh, please. She'll be so happy when she gets the Rose, she won't even care.
translation.it: Sarà così felice quando avrà la Rosa che non le importerà.

translation.en: The Rose'll clear all my debts to her, and then some.
So, you'll walk away.
Oh, good for you. What's in it for me?
translation.it: Buon per te. E io che ci guadagno?

translation.en: If you help me get this Rose,
I promise I won't give it to her unless she sets you free.
translation.it: Se mi aiuterai, ti prometto che gliela darò solo se ti libererà.

translation.en: Out on my own. Love it. What else?
We can get pizza on the way.
[chuckling] Yes, I am very in.
Here, just hoof-pump it, bruh.
What do I call you anyways? Piggy?
Oh, I get it. "Piggy." Because I'm a pig. Because all pigs look alike to you.
translation.it: Oh, certo, perché sono un maiale. Tutti i maiali sono uguali.

translation.en: My name is Hoagie. Not "Pig," not "Piggy," not "Oinkie," just "Hoagie."
Hoagie, I was kidding.
[Hoagie] Just for that "Piggy" crack, I'm gonna pick the pizza.
translation.it: Dato che mi hai insultato, sceglierò io la pizza.

translation.en: [Daniel, munching] Oh!
Good call on the veggie pizza.
Yeah, I don't know what it is, but I just don't feel right eating pepperoni anymore.
translation.it: Non so perché, ma quella con la salsiccia non mi scende.

translation.en: What's the deal with this Albright place?
I've tracked the Fugu Rose for a long time. The search led me here.
translation.it: Le mie lunghe ricerche mi hanno portato qui.

translation.en: A soap factory. It's more than a soap factory.
translation.it: - Una fabbrica di sapone. - È molto di più.

translation.en: I've snuck a bunch of times. It's in there. Somewhere. How do you know that? You don't have my nose for this.
translation.it: - Sono entrato molte volte. È lì dentro. - Come lo sai? Non hai il mio naso.

translation.en: It's called planning, dummy.
Oh, look at me.
I got my hands so I can type and Wiki stuff and think I'm sooo great.
translation.it: Ho due mani con cui fare ricerche su Wikipedia. Come sono forte!

translation.en: Hoagie, keep quiet and stay loose.
Loose? What do you mean?
Whoa, dude, that is not cool.
I'm already down an eye, you trying to break a leg too?
translation.it: Ho un occhio solo! Vuoi farmi rompere una zampa?

translation.en: [Daniel sighs] I did say stay loose.
[Hoagie] So sorry, I haven't exactly been keeping up with my yoga.
translation.it: Scusa tanto, non sto facendo molto yoga.

translation.en: There's magic all over the place in here,
but I'm getting one really strong scent.
translation.it: ma c'è un odore che è molto forte.

translation.en: [Daniel] I knew it. It's this lab, right?
No, the strongest whiff of magic is…
translation.it: No, l'odore magico più forte è…

translation.en: There! Ta-da!
Oh, great, you're defective.
I literally just fed you.
Because I'm a pig. Because pigs love to eat.
translation.it: Sì, perché i maiali amano mangiare.

translation.en: The alchemist triad? Bingo.
I wonder what it could be.
Not that one either.
Are you sure you did it right?
Uh… I don't even think there's any kind of magic in here. This is nothing but a dusty old vending machine.
translation.it: Non credo sia magico. È solo un vecchio distributore.

translation.en: My nose doesn't lie.
Your nose is just trying to get a free Twinkie.
translation.it: Il tuo naso vuole una merendina.

translation.en: Oh, I see. That's how it's gonna be.
[Daniel] I'll give 'em credit. This was a great hiding place.
translation.it: I miei complimenti. È un ottimo nascondiglio.

translation.en: Oh, this room reeks of magic.
translation.it: Oh, questa stanza puzza di magia.

translation.en: It's itching the inside of my brain.
Get it together, Hoagie. We're on the clock. Only a few hours until my deal runs out.
translation.it: Concentrati, Hoagie. L'accordo scadrà tra poche ore.

translation.en: Where'd you go?
[in evil voice] There is no Hoagie, only King of the Squid People.
translation.it: Non c'è nessun Hoagie! Sono il Re delle Piovre. Eseguite i miei ordini piovreschi.

translation.en: Do squid things for me.
translation.it: Sono il Re delle Piovre. Eseguite i miei ordini piovreschi.

translation.en: Get down off the tentacore.
Chill. I'm just having a little fun.
I'll chill when we get the Rose. -Don't touch anything. -Hmm.
translation.it: Mi calmerò quando avrò la Rosa. Non toccare nulla.

translation.en: There's no telling what's magically booby-trapped in here.
translation.it: Non sappiamo quali trappole ci siano.

translation.en: [gasps] There it is.
That's the Fugu Rose? Just grab some flowers and split.
translation.it: È quella? Cogline qualcuna e andiamo.

translation.en: This whole place was built around this to protect it.
Does that give you any idea of how powerful it is?
translation.it: Hai idea di quanto sia potente?

translation.en: One rose on this bush can be used to extend life by decades,
translation.it: Solo una di queste rose dona lunga vita.

translation.en: but touching any of the others brings instant, painful death.
translation.it: Toccare le altre porterebbe a un'istantanea e dolorosa morte.

translation.en: Oh, I get your plan now.
You mistook me for a guinea pig.
-No, I-- -[squeals]
[screaming] A little help!
This is why you don't touch anything.
translation.it: Ecco perché non devi toccare niente.

translation.en: Oh, no. I'm too young to become pepperoni!
translation.it: Sono troppo giovane per diventare un salame!

translation.en: Immune to stun spells. That's real--
Score!
Let's get that rose and get out.
Heaven help me, it tastes so good!
translation.it: Che il cielo mi aiuti. È squisito!

translation.en: -Hoagie… get me… the sword… now. -[thumping]
-[thumping continues] -This… genuinely… hurts.
[Hoagie] I've got the sword!
Daniel! You want me? Come and get me, land sushi.
translation.it: Daniel! Vuoi anche me? Vieni a prendermi, sushi!

translation.en: Oh, man, did you just touch that rose?
Oh, I bet you're feeling stupid now.
Daniel! Tell me you're okay.
Didn't I say not to touch anything?! You almost got me killed!
translation.it: Non avevo detto di non toccare nulla? Mi hai quasi fatto ammazzare.

translation.en: No, I saved you.
From a thing you brought to life with your touching!
translation.it: Da una cosa che il tuo tocco ha portato in vita.

translation.en: Now I'm drenched in walking fish guts. -Pfft. You're still alive. -[sighs]
translation.it: - Ora sono coperto di budella di pesce. - Sei ancora vivo.

translation.en: You want this rose or not? Because I know which one to definitely not touch.
translation.it: Vuoi questa Rosa o no? So quale non toccare.

translation.en: Tell me the right one to pick.
I'm trying. I'm a little fired up right now.
I'm not used to facing death so many times in one day.
translation.it: Non sono abituato a rischiare così spesso la vita.

translation.en: Yes! Best Tracker alive.
translation.it: Sì! Il miglior Cercatore del mondo.

translation.en: Man, I was like 65% sure I was right. Thank goodness.
translation.it: Ero sicuro al 65% che fosse quella. Meno male!

translation.en: Wait, what?
Uh, those were decent odds. Just take the victory lap and be happy.
translation.it: Erano buone probabilità. Accetta la vittoria.

translation.en: Come on, I got you.
Alley-oop.
-Thanks. -Good work, man.
translation.it: Grazie. Ottimo lavoro. Che ne dici di restare? Siamo una bella squadra.

translation.en: What do you think about hanging around? We make an okay team, yeah?
translation.it: Ottimo lavoro. Che ne dici di restare? Siamo una bella squadra.

translation.en: Oh, so I can help you make money off of my power. What an offer.
translation.it: E sfrutterai il mio potere per arricchirti. Bella offerta.

translation.en: Where are you gonna go? You're a magic talking pig. The normal world won't know what to do with you.
translation.it: Dove andrai? Sei un maiale parlante. Il mondo normale non ti accetterà.

translation.en: Thanks. I'll take my chances.
Lots of better jobs out there for a pig than being your nose servant.
translation.it: Ci sono lavori migliori oltre che essere il tuo naso.

translation.en: Hoagie, you're right. We can make money.
translation.it: Hoagie, hai ragione. Possiamo fare soldi.

translation.en: Together. Split it 50/50. Watch each other's backs. What'd you say?
translation.it: Insieme. Faremo a metà. Ci aiuteremo a vicenda. Allora?

translation.en: Now you're talking. All right. I'm in.
translation.it: Ora si ragiona. Va bene. Io ci sto.

translation.en: Dowsers. Run for it!
I swear I never touched anything.
[female dowser] By order of the Bureau of Magical Enforcement,
translation.it: Per ordine del Dipartimento per il Controllo della Magia,

translation.en: you are both under arrest.
translation.it: Per ordine del Dipartimento per il Controllo della Magia, siete in arresto.

translation.en: I do not know this guy.
We are not together.
Thanks.
